title: "Few Shot Learning AI accurately ‘senses’ home appliances"
excerpt: "NIALM (Non-Intrusive Appliance Load Monitoring) can ‘sense’ appliances using electrical power. NIALM is used in homes and small buildings. NIALM needs hundreds of labelled power signal images from each appliance type to train on."
